title: american horror story coven - cordelia gets her second sight back
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: "I believe I saw the future. A terrifying future." ~Cordelia Goode

I think when Cordelia asked for the ring, she actually wanted to confirm her vision. She knew her mother is incredibly selfish, grasping at anything of hers, so when Fiona acquiesced to give her an other piece of heirloom no less... That’s when Cordelia knew her mother had truly planned to kill her, otherwise, she would have never given it. God, it was so beautifully done, like it was very subtle but a proof of incredible thinking. Such composure and intelligence from Cordelia.
i really don't know how Cordelia controlled herself during this scene, i would've snapped Fiona's neck.
This is one of the best scenes of the season.

When you think about it the vision was almost correct... (spoilers) Madison dies by her throat being slit, Zoe dies by a fence in her stomach (from transmutation), Misty dies by her own hell, and Queenie doesn't really die but gets seriously injured by a witch hunter...
description:
American horror story coven - Cordelia gets her second sight back during a mother daughter moment with Fiona 
3x12 Go To Hell
